forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain after 10pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. South southeast wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the city emerges with a gentle embrace of cloud and serenity. The morning is partly sunny, with tendrils of fog lingering at the edges of awareness, hinting at the day's shift towards a more overcast disposition. The current temperature lingers in the cool range, inviting a thoughtful choice of layers. Light breezes whisper through the streets, carrying the promise of rain as night approaches.

As the hours advance, expect a steady transition; the bright hints of sunshine will yield to a thickening blanket of clouds, accompanied by the soft patter of rain beginning after 10 PM. The humidity rises, and any morning clarity will soon give way to a cozy, damp ambiance befitting a leisurely indoor day. Embrace this opportunity to gather with friends over coffee in a local café, perhaps venturing into an art gallery, where the warmth of creativity contrasts with the cooling air outside. For those out and about, a light jacket or cozy sweater, complemented by an umbrella, will serve well as the evening approaches, ensuring comfort in the shifting weather.
